dmca.title: Satirist protests plagiarism
dmca.body:
Please process this notice of infringement. I believe this posting of my work exceeds fair use. The poster uses his own byline, and posted a lengthy article without any added value. The following information is provided in accordance with Google's Digital Millennium Copyright Act page:

1) Copynghted Work: originally published at:

http://www.spoofnews.com/content/view/229/1

A copy of the article is enclosed
